text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Wh-wha? When did I...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...Rice Shower.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah... Bourbon...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: So this is what defeat feels like.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...Huh?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Frustration at failing to complete<n>one's task. And there is
another<n>emotion too, one that burns...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...Rice Shower, this victory is yours.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I... I won?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: You ran tremendously.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Next time, I'll be a more formidable<n>opponent. I hope to race
you again,<n>Rice Shower.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Me... me too!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I really did it... I really won...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I did it! McQueen! You guys! Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Aww yeah, that's our Rice! She really<n>brought back the W!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: She did! We couldn't have hoped for<n>more!

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Look, she's coming to the stands!<n>Let's all call out to her!
On three—

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: I dunno, this is kinda disappointing.

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: ...Huh?

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. Here I was thinking I'd get to<n>see the birth of an
undefeated Triple<n>Crown legend.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
There are more than just a couple of<n>comments like that.
We were just too<n>busy celebrating to notice until now.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: So this is what McQueen meant...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
My true concern was what would<n>happen should she deny
the Triple<n>Crown so many were hoping to see.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The ambivalent mood enveloping the<n>racecourse seems to
stifle our cries of<n>joy.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The ambivalent mood enveloping the<n>racecourse seems to
stifle our cries of<n>joy.
